extendedInfo.description: Amazed 2 FREE has been released, please download that instead.Using the built in accelerometer, navigate your white marble through the maze.  The marble follows whatever direction the device is tilted. The exit area is represented with light blue tiles, watch out for the black "void".

reviews.comment: The ball has no way of even tilting up and without landscape mode its even harder to play.....epic fail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Restarts and asks you to bring your screen back to portrait mode if you tilt it too much making this game virtually unplayable. Uninstall. Desire HD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Oooh.......sooooo hard. And Flora,if u like this game more than others y don\'t u try labyrinth lite stupid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why would you put this on tha market?
reviews.comment: Seems like a programming student\'s first assignment.  Doesn\'t work, with the \"return your phone to portrait\" flaw.  Cheap and amaturish, anyway.  Why would you put something unfinished on the market?  And can\'t you remove it from the market, rather than just say \"please install other version\"?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dude don\'t whine for how big the file is this game is fun enough . Graphic are lo-fi but its a small file! Would b cool if u could change the colours
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I found a glitch on level 2  to where if u roll all the way to the bottem, itll say sorry  and unexpected error has occord  then u have to force close
